title: The Fundamental Group of an Algebraic Stack

title_detail.value: The Fundamental Group of an Algebraic Stack

summary:
We define the notion of fundamental group of an algebraic stack, prove a
comparison theorem between the fundamental group of a stack over the complex
numbers and that of the associated analytic orbifold, show that this notion
coincides with that defined with simplicial schemes by Oda and finally prove
some short exact sequences involving these groups.

summary_detail.value:
